title: Chair Fit
description: Fitness/nutrition application for people that sit in chairs all day. Under construction, click the link below to follow my progress!

title: Blog CMS
description: User interface for managing my portfolios blog content. Unit tests were conducted with jest, react testing library, and msw resulting in 96.5% line coverage.

title: Blog API
description: REST API for creation, editing, and deletion of my portfolios blog posts, comments, and users. Integration tests were conducted with supertest and jest resulting in 94.9% line coverage.

title: Portfolio
description: Webpage for displaying my work and contact information (the site you are currently on). Unit tests were conducted with jest, react testing library, and msw resulting in 94.7% line coverage.

title: Battleship
description: Recreation of the board game Battleship. Game logic was developed using the test driven development methodology. Tests conducted using jest resulting in 100% line coverage.
